pathfinding.name: SHORTEST_PATH
pathfinding.signature: SHORTEST_PATH(start, end, edge_type [, WEIGHT BY field USING algo])
pathfinding.description: Finds shortest path. Algorithm depends on USING clause.

pathfinding.name: ALL_SHORTEST_PATHS
pathfinding.description: Finds all shortest paths (multiple with same cost).

pathfinding.name: K_SHORTEST_PATHS
pathfinding.description: Finds K shortest paths using Yen's algorithm.

plugin_architecture.description: Third-party algorithms can be registered as UDFs.

performance_notes.description: Graph algorithms can be computationally expensive
optimizations: Use parallel execution where possible (PageRank, Connected Components)
Cache intermediate results for repeated calculations
Provide progress indicators for long-running algorithms
Allow query timeouts to prevent runaway computation
best_practices: Run expensive algorithms during off-peak hours
Consider pre-computing centrality metrics and storing as node properties
Use LIMIT clauses when exploring algorithm results
Test algorithms on sample subgraphs before running on full dataset
